title: Think Thin - 101 Affirmations for Losing Weight and Keeping it Off
description: Change your thoughts... change your life. The role of positive thinking is an extraordinary one, and the sooner we start believing the ideal life is within our grasp, the sooner we'll start to reflect that, both inside and out. Today is that imaginary date in the future where you finally get to look and feel your absolute best
author: Lisa Poeltl
